thread.title: Securing Cloud Workloads to Meet Requirements for State and Local Government Agencies

title: Securing Cloud Workloads to Meet Requirements for State and Local Government Agencies
text:
23 Securing Cloud Workloads to Meet Requirements for State and Local Government Agencies 
eWeek: Increasingly, state and local governments are turning to cloud services for their promises of competitive advantage, ease of use and cost savings. But a move to the cloud brings with it concerns about security. While many of these concerns are justified, with proper planning, the cloud has the potential to enhance security for your agency.
